recommended_degree: Desain Komunikasi Visual, Ilmu Komunikasi, Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Pemasaran Digital, Hubungan Masyarakat (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Overview: Support initiatives to strengthen the company’s image as an employer of choice through content development, digital campaigns, and employee engagement activities. Support initiatives to activate Tech community. 

Responsibilities 
- Develop creative content and visuals for employer branding campaigns.
- Develop Community content, and event engagement
- Monitor engagement and performance on digital platforms.
- Assist in event coordination and internal communication programs.
- Collaborate with Marketing teams to ensure consistent brand messaging.

Qualifications 
- Diploma or Bachelor’s degree in DKV/Communication/Public Relation/Event Managemen/Marketing
- Skilled in Design tools: Canva, Adobe Illustrator, CapCut/VN/InShot
- Familiar with social media analytics tools, specifically TikTok
- Creative, digitally savvy, and detail-oriented.
-  Excellent communication and storytelling skills.
